about.bio: Full Stack Developer with a Bachelor's degree in Computer Science and 7+ years of experience. Skilled in designing, coding, testing, and maintaining application programs and interfaces. Experienced in troubleshooting, modifying procedures, and evaluating user requests. Strong communication, problem-solving, and time management abilities. Knowledgeable about end-to-end systems development life cycles
educationSummaryLines: B.Sc Degree in Computer Engineering and Informatics

projects.title: Jawadi Finances
projects.description: A comprehensive financial management application tailored to our family's needs, showcasing full-stack development skills and proficiency in building scalable, user-centric applications. It enhances confidentiality, accountability, and addresses specific family financial management needs with features like collaborative transaction management, budget monitoring, and category-based spending limits.
projects.shortDescription: Streamline your family finances with this collaborative app. Track expenses, create budgets, and set spending limits for complete financial control.

features.name: Dashboard
features.description: Provides a detailed overview of monthly expenses and budgets, with filters by store and payment type.

features.name: Calendar Integration
features.description: Includes a robust calendar for visualizing daily expenditures.

features.name: Transactions Page
features.description: Enables adding, updating, and deleting transactions, organized by months.

features.name: Budget Page
features.description: Allows monthly budget planning based on current expenses and balances.

features.name: Metadata Management
features.description: Customize categories, payment types, and transaction types as per specific needs.

features.name: User Authentication
features.description: Ensures data security and privacy by requiring authentication to access transactional data.

projects.title: HDR Data Exploration
projects.description: The HDR Data Exploration System is a web-based application designed for exploring and analyzing Human Development Resources data. It offers powerful tools and interactive features for filtering, sorting, and exporting data on various development indicators like GDI, IHDI, GII, PHDI, and MPI. This platform supports informed decision-making, policy development, and research initiatives aimed at improving human well-being globally.
projects.shortDescription: The HDR Data Exploration System is a web application for exploring Human Development Resources data. It offers interactive tools for filtering, sorting, exporting, and analyzing various development indicators.

features.name: Data Coverage
features.description: Comprehensive data coverage Across multiple development indices.

features.name: Data filtering
features.description: Flexible Data Filtering Based on various parameters like Country/Region/Group, Year, indicators.

features.name: Dynamic data visualization
features.description: Through interactive displays.

features.name: Sorting
features.description: Efficient data sorting and organization by Year, value.

features.name: Data Export
features.description: Versatile data export options For further analysis (JSON, Excel).

projects.title: Game Hub
projects.description: Game Hub is a dynamic web application that empowers users to effortlessly explore and discover their next favorite game. By leveraging the GameAPI and React, the platform offers a curated collection of games, meticulously organized by genre and platform. Immerse yourself in a visually appealing interface featuring sleek card designs and a user-friendly sidebar for seamless navigation
projects.shortDescription: Game Hub is a React-powered game discovery platform that simplifies finding games by genre and platform.

features.name: Comprehensive Game Catalog
features.description: Explore a vast library of games with detailed information and captivating visuals.

features.name: Advanced Filtering
features.description: Easily refine your search by genre and platform to discover tailored game recommendations.

features.name: Intuitive Sorting
features.description: Organize games by release date, title, or other criteria to suit your preferences.

features.name: Dynamic Interface
features.description: Enjoy a visually striking design with customizable dark and light themes.

features.name: Loading Indicators
features.description: Experience smooth performance with skeleton loading screens for essential elements.

features.name: API Integration
features.description: Seamlessly integrates with the GameAPI to provide accurate and up-to-date game data.

projects.title: Calculator
projects.description: Calculator is a user-friendly, component-based React application designed for efficient one and two-digit arithmetic operations. It offers a clean interface with reusable components, enabling seamless calculations for basic mathematical functions such as addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division.
projects.shortDescription: A simple yet effective React calculator for basic arithmetic operations.

features.name: Basic Arithmetic
features.description: Performs addition, subtraction, multiplication, and division for one and two-digit numbers.

features.name: User-Friendly Interface
features.description: Offers an intuitive design for easy interaction.

features.name: Component-Based Architecture
features.description: Built with reusable components for modularity and maintainability.

features.name: Clear Display
features.description: Provides clear and immediate calculation results.

features.name: Efficient Performance
features.description: Delivers fast and accurate calculations.
